name: Release 2.16.0
body:
* Add python 3.10 & 3.11 support
* Optional support for `fastuuid` library & faster datetime parsing

name: Release 2.15.3
body: - #190 Fix type error thrown from valid Union types

name: Release 2.15.2
body:
- #189 - Fix incorrect conversion of unions of lists and strings
- #188 - Improve handling of type unions

name: Release 2.15.1
body: Fix #182 - Generated tuple schema is incompatible with OpenAPI 3.0

name: Release 2.15.0
body:
#161 - Nullable is always Falsey
#168 - Fix handling of untyped container types in Python 3.9
#169 - Preserve type of dict keys when converting to & from json
#165 - Type hint of `from_json` is now compatible with `json.loads()`
#172 - Kwargs of `__init_subclass__` are now passed to parent
#171 - Support discriminators when used with type unions

name: Release 2.14.1
body: #158 - Handle custom formats with `fastjsonschema` correctly

name: Release 2.14.0
body:
#153 - Support PEP 604 type annotations
#152 - Support PEP 585 types
#114 - Python module name now included as extension property for OpenAPI 3
#149 - Fix import of decimal module
#143 - Add support for Python 3.9
#147 - Fix handling of `Optional[Union[A,B]]`

name: Release 2.13.0
body: #142 - Add support for Python 3.8

name: Release 2.12.1
body: Fix #134 - Unrecognized enum values not handled correctly if the field is optional

name: Release 2.12.0
body:
* Implemented #124 - date field encoder
* Fixed #122 - Discriminator not added to field properties
* Fixed #125 - Support calling `to_dict` with unknown enum values

name: Release 2.11.1
body: Fix #115 - Custom field encoders for `NewType` fields are now called in `from_dict`

name: Release 2.11.0
body:
* #109 - Handle unrecognized enum values
* #108 - Add support for type specialisation in subclasses
* #113 - Raise error when inheritance and `allow_additional_props=False` both used

name: Release 2.10.1
body: Pin fastjsonschema to 2.13

name: Release 2.10.0
body:
* #54 - Support serialising python properties
* #102 - Add class argument to allow/disallow additional properties

name: Release 2.9.0
body:
* Implement set support - #95
* Fix generated schema for the Any type - #100

name: Release 2.8.0
body:
Implement #69 - Support OpenAPI 3 discriminators
Implement #35 - Add `from_json` and `to_json` convenience methods
Fix #90 - `DuplicateNameError` can be thrown when adding multiple schemas

name: Release 2.7.3
body: Fixed #87 - Improve handling of None in `from_object`

name: Release 2.7.2
body:
Implemented #84 - Improve enum handling in `from_object`. Add missing return type annotation for `from_object`.
Implemented #83 - Support field names prefixed with a single underscore

name: Release 2.6.2
body: Fix #82 - Fix schema caching issues when using inheritance

name: Release 2.6.1
body: Fix #79 - Nullable type causes mypy errors

name: Release 2.6.0
body:
* Implement #57 - Add support for nullable types
* Implement #40 - Support dataclass inheritance using 'allOf'
* Fix #76 - Optional type check fails for optional union types

name: Release 2.5.0
body:
* #70 - Switch to fastjsonschema instead of pyvalico
* #46 - Add APISpec plugin
* #71 - Fix warning if `None` used as default value for readOnly fields
* #55 - Fix warning `.from_dict` used with `Any` types

name: Release 2.4.0
body:
Implemented:
 * #51 - Support additional field types
 * #58 - Support literal types
 * #67 - Add `from_object` method
 * #62 - Add support for `Final` qualified types

Fixed:
  * #59 - Don't include empty definitions object in generated schema

name: Release 2.3.0
body: Implemented #52 - Support the `readOnly` and `writeOnly` OpenAPI 3 keywords

name: Release 2.2.0
body:
Implemented #47 - Support property descriptions using field metadata
Fixed #45 - Field defaults using default_factory are included in generated schema

name: Release 2.1.2
body:
Fix #42 - Handle fields using `default_factory`
Fix #41 - Correctly handle fields with a default nested class instance

name: Release 2.1.1
body:
Fix #36 - Errors when generating json schema with default values
Fix #38 - Optional fields without None default value not handled correctly
Fix #39 - Unable to disable validation in nested dataclasses

name: Release 2.1.0
body:
* Fix #30 - Support default field values
* Fix #31 - Support fields excluded from __init__
* Improve README

name: Release 2.0.0
body:
* #13 - Implement support for type unions
* Add support for embedding into swagger 3.0 specs
* #12 - Improve type annotations on `from_dict` method
* #27 - Deprecated calling `JsonSchemaMixin.json_schema()`. Add `all_json_schems`
* Raise custom ValidationError instead of using the validation lib ValidationError

name: Release 1.5.2
body: Fix #25 - Datetimes are no longer rounded down to the nearest second

name: Release 1.5.1
body: Fix #23 Keyword 'x-enum-name' breaks schema validation.

name: Release 1.5.0
body: Implemented #21: Include enum name information in generated schema

name: Release 1.4.3
body:
Fix #19 NewType of dataclass is not serialised
Fix #18 Improve support for non-string dict keys

name: Release 1.4.2
body: Fix #17 - Definitions can be missed for nested types

name: Release 1.4.1
body: Fix performance bug in `from_dict` with validation enabled.

name: Release 1.4.0
body:
Support Tuple types
Fix validation warning from swagger validator
Add package type information
Add optional dependency to enable fast JSON schema validation

name: Release 1.2.1
body:
Fix performance regression from v1.2.0. This improves performance by approximately 3x from 1.2.0 and 2x from 1.1.1.

Invalid enum values are no longer allowed, even with JSON schema validation disabled.

name: Release 1.2.0
body:
Support recursively defined data structures using forward references
Support internal-only fields prefixed with _
Fix incorrect json schema generated when using typing.Any with List or Dict

name: Python 3.7 fixes
body: Fix type detection for python 3.7

name: NewType support
body:
Support NewType fields and custom field schema's for NewType fields
Fix bug decoding fields from JSON

Fix invalid schema when all fields are optional
Fix bug decoding enum fields
Fix option for disabling schema validation

Use setuptools_scm to handle versioning
Fix issue in setup.py
